mid_knife: Looks like someone was in a rush to cut something...

note: This is where I found that note.
Note: Do not forget to turn off the lights.

mirror: This mirror is pretty old and rusty.
tooth_brush: I should probably get my own...

knife: What was that knife doing here?
I should grab this before anyone gets hurt.
This knife has... blood? on it.

water: I can't clean this up without a mop.
This water has red tint on it...

screen: The TV is turned off, where is the remote?
Hey! The TV turned on but I dont like this show...

remote: This is where I found the remote.
Hey! Now I can turn on the TV.
I wonder if it has batteries.
